text: The case made by the claim referred to in section 15-521 shall be entered on the docket as an action by the claimant or the defendant against the plaintiff and tried in the same manner as other cases before the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
historical:

DC CODE § 15-522

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Exemptions and Trial of Right to Seized Property.

subchapter.text: Trial of Right to Property Seized on Process of Superior Court.

heading.catch_text: Docketing of claim; manner of trial.
